backend/main.mo: Motoko actor providing authorization, user profiles, order CRUD, and sensitive file storage using mixins and access control checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI feature requests to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and styling details of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining Arabic RTL layout and loading the main React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, header layout, tabs, profile setup, and section routing within an RTL UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginGate.t: Wrapper component that blocks content until the user logs in, showing a login card when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new users to enter their name, with save logic and defensive modal cleanup behavior.
frontend/src/components/reminders/Remind: Displays a reminder dialog for an order with cleanup logic and formatted date rendering.
frontend/src/components/system/AppErrorB: Global error boundary that catches React errors and shows a recovery screen with reload option.
frontend/src/features/orders/OrderTracki: Manages order CRUD, reminders, and notification permissions with dialogs and cleanup handling.
frontend/src/features/orders/useReminder: Hook that checks order reminder times, triggers notifications, and tracks dismissed reminders.
frontend/src/features/pdf/pdfjsConfig.ts: Loads PDF.js from a CDN using a dynamic module script and exposes its API.
frontend/src/features/pdf/pdfScan.ts: Scans PDF pages for sensitive words using PDF.js and returns matches with page numbers.
frontend/src/features/pdf/PdfUploadSecti: Handles PDF file selection, upload with progress, and scanning for sensitive words.
frontend/src/features/sensitiveWords/Sen: UI component to add, edit, delete, and view sensitive words using related query hooks and dialogs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, sensitive words, orders, and file uploads via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme variables, RTL support, and custom UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/utils/modalCleanup.ts: Utility to clean up leftover modal side effects by restoring document and body styles and attributes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters and storing/retrieving them from sessionStorage, including support for hash-based routing and parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and container settings, with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app features, known issues, and architectural notes for an Arabic PDF uploader with sensitive-word management and order tracking.
